articles.title: Sam Bankman-Fried's anonymous bail sponsors revealed: What we know - Business Insider
articles.description: Sam Bankman-Fried's bail sponsors have been identified as former Stanford Law Dean Larry Kramer and Stanford research scientist Andreas Paepcke. Here's what we know about them.
articles.content:
The two anonymous sponsors of Sam Bankman-Fried's $250 million bail have been revealed.
